section.title: openSUSE Project
section.text: We are a global community promoting and developing openSUSE Linux. We believe in building great technology through open collaboration, without barriers or bureaucrats. We make computers useful tools, stable but not outdated. Learn more about openSUSE here and get the latest openSUSE news here.

section.title: Build Service
section.text: openSUSE means participating fairly in Free and Open Source Software. We contribute to projects like the Linux kernel, GNU gcc, Samba, KDE and GNOME. Our tools are useful to all, like Open Build Service, the filesystem snapshot and recovery tool Snapper, and the distribution testing tool openQA. openSUSE meets a wide range of needs thanks to initiatives like our Rolling Release Tumbleweed and the easy custom OS builder SUSE Studio.

section.title: Community Support
section.text: We want you to have a great openSUSE experience. Our Online Help site provides a lot of information and you can find answers and ask questions on our openSUSE Forums. Look here to find more openSUSE communication channels.
